name: In re ESTATE of Laura J. HORN, an incompetent person. Appeal of the FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF SAYRE by Merger, Commonwealth Bank and Trust Company

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in. the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re ESTATE of Laura J. HORN, an incompetent person. Appeal of the FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF SAYRE by Merger, Commonwealth Bank and Trust Company.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in. the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: DeSisti & Keefee, M. J. DeSisti, Sayre, for appellant.
Robert J. Landy, Sayre, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
385 A.2d 976
In re ESTATE of Laura J. HORN, an incompetent person. Appeal of the FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF SAYRE by Merger, Commonwealth Bank and Trust Company.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 12, 1978.
Decided May 15, 1978.
DeSisti & Keefee, M. J. DeSisti, Sayre, for appellant.
Robert J. Landy, Sayre, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
